russian bind off i have also included alternate charts for row 122 through 189 showing the large repeats in these row as opposed to the main set of charts that give the entire row it was easier for me to design this way they should knit up identical to the original charts but i have not actually knit to them in addition i have also include the written instructions for these row mostly for the repeat counts of all of those yo decrease pairs again i have not knit the shawl using these instructions 4 copyright ©2015 denise e m bartels b locking is a bit fiddley because of the uneven increases i found it easiest to pin the center spine a straight blocking wire is a big help here and then work from there outwards along the bottom edge lining up the branches as
